room_title: Escape room "You Can't Handle the Truth" by Challenge Accepted in Chicago
review: This was our first escape room ever.  And although we didn't make it out on time, we had a blast with only 3 people. Would recommend to anybody who wants to see how smart they really are. 5 out of 5 are going back to do another room. Keep it up guys!!!!

room_title: Escape room "You Can't Handle the Truth" by Challenge Accepted in Chicago
review: I had a great time! I came here with my friend and participated in a 60-minute room. Prices are worth the experience - $29 each. Staff was super friendly and welcomed all questions. Challenge Accepted provides something new and refreshing (instead of a typical movie night).

room_title: Escape room "You Can't Handle the Truth" by Challenge Accepted in Chicago
review: Employees are very helpful, and give the perfect amount of help needed. Definitely  worth a visit, especially if you're already a fan of escape rooms. Not alienating for beginners, though.
